description: SEC Central Index Key - unique firm identifier
Stock ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, NVDA)
Company name from SEC EDGAR filings
Company name from Bloomberg Terminal
Calendar year of financial data (2015-2024)
Standard Industrial Classification code (4-digit)
North American Industry Classification System code (6-digit)
NAICS 3-digit industry code (used to merge with tariff data)
Industry Classification Benchmark subsector name
Market capitalization in USD (most recent available)
Most recent stock price in USD
Pre-tax income from foreign operations (USD). Directly from XBRL tag or computed as Total - Domestic.
Pre-tax income from domestic (US) operations (USD)
Total pre-tax income from all operations (USD)
Foreign Profit Share = Foreign Pre-Tax Income / Total Pre-Tax Income. Main variable of interest.
Foreign Profit Share winsorized at 1st and 99th percentiles to reduce outlier influence
Flag (True/False) indicating original FPS was outside 1st-99th percentile range
Total revenue in USD (annual)
Pre-tax income in USD from Bloomberg (annual). Serves as cross-check against SEC EDGAR total_pretax_income.
Research and development expense in USD (annual)
Total assets in USD (annual)
Total debt (short-term + long-term) in USD (annual)
Capital expenditure in USD (annual, typically negative as cash outflow)
Effective tax rate as a percentage (annual)
Total operating expenses in USD (annual)
NAICS-3 sector name from tariff exposure data
Number of HS-8 products targeted by Section 301 tariffs in this NAICS-3 industry
Number of product varieties (HS-8 x country) targeted by Section 301 tariffs
Mean tariff rate increase (proportion) from Section 301 for products in this NAICS-3 industry
Standard deviation of tariff rate increase within the NAICS-3 industry
